alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 9:35PM EST until March 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN MERCER...MONMOUTH AND SOUTHEASTERN MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 934 PM EST, severe showers and embedded thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rye to near Sheepshead Bay to Crosswicks, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Asbury Park, Middletown, Old Bridge, Howell, Marlboro, Manalapan, Tinton Falls, Holmdel, Red Bank, Matawan, Jamesburg, Hightstown, Cranbury, Farmingdale, Roosevelt, Brownville, East Freehold, West Freehold and Adelphia. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8 and 8A. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 2 and 8. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 61 and 62. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 99 and 123. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This line of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms may contain little or no lightning. Do not wait until you hear thunder before taking cover.
